EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Top 5 (1338488730.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Chilli, Nice to meet you via email! I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Steve Arhancet Sent: Thursday, May 31, 2012 2:03 PM To: Chilli Cc: Sara Conde Subject: RE: Top 5 Chilli, There are a number of tradeshows. I actually think there is a small business tradeshow that’s coming up in DC. You can also sign up for our Independent Consulting Brief. It talks about everything you should be ‘in-the-know’ about regarding consulting or starting your own consulting company. I would like to introduce you to Sara who you can chat with about what’s out there and how to get started. Sara, Can you please reach out to Chilli and talk about all the resources that are out there for new IC’s? Steve From: Chilli [mailto:customercare@vortexchillers.com] <mailto:[mailto:customercare@vortexchillers.com]> Sent: Thursday, May 31, 2012 12:27 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: RE: Top 5 Thank you Steve! Do you know of any publications I could be subscribed to for the industry? Also, I am hoping to find a good small business consulting trade show or convention to attend where I could get a clearer idea of how to shape my new consulting business. Any suggestions? Thanks again, Advice For the Digital AgeChilli Schockwww.smartmarketadvice.com <http://www.smartmarketadvice.com/>(805) 931-6655110 S. Mary Ave St2, #127Nipomo Ca 93444 From: Steve Arhancet [mailto:sarhancet@mbopartners.com] <mailto:[mailto:sarhancet@mbopartners.com]> Sent: Thursday, May 31, 2012 6:48 AM To: Chilli Subject: RE: Top 5 All the data and contracts are all available here on our private links. http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-arhancet.html <http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-arhancet.html> Regards, Steve From: Chilli [mailto:customercare@vortexchillers.com] <mailto:[mailto:customercare@vortexchillers.com]> Sent: Wednesday, May 30, 2012 6:20 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Top 5 I just listened to your Top 5 webinar and at the end you offered to send example contracts for the different type work you offer to your consult customers. May I ask for these examples? Thanks in advance. Advice For the Digital AgeChilli Schockwww.smartmarketadvice.com <http://www.smartmarketadvice.com/>(805) 931-6655110 S.
